Abyss:BehemothsWisdom.NAME: Behemoth's Wisdom
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yExhaust up to #b{0} cards then draw that many.

Abyss:BehemothsCourage.NAME: Behemoth's Courage
Abyss:BehemothsCourage.FLAVOR: It's easy to be courageous when you have skin of iron.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b{0} #yMetallicize and #b{1} #yBlur.

Abyss:CrystalEnergy.NAME: Crystal Energy
Abyss:CrystalEnergy.FLAVOR: It's easy to be courageous when you have skin of iron.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you take #b{0} or more damage in a turn, heal #b{1} HP.

Abyss:HuntersRespect.NAME: Hunter's Respect
Abyss:HuntersRespect.FLAVOR: From one big game hunter to another.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your second turn, draw #b1 additional card.
